channel.title: Please help!
channel.description:
5 Questions.
1: Why when i spawn Make over mage ant trying to change somfin i get clost? How can i fix it 2: How can i change when player first tiem log in in server inventor? 3: How i can change teles in tele tab and change teleports locations? 4: How i can change death place? 5: How i can add shops? If you help me i'll rep you if i can.
Base: Delta
Thanks and sorry for bad english.

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @imsokool22 imsokool22
item.description:
@imsokool22 wrote:

1.idk you probably added the maker-over-mage wrong
2.please explain what you mean I don’t understand
3.you change that in clickingmost.java i think its that or client.java
4.look up the coords and change the reset() void to the coords you want
5.ok for this is will post what you have to change
5.1 open autospawn.cfg you will see this code

spawn = 2821 2856 3599 0 0 0 0 0 1 Zeke
change the 2821 to the npc id(to add the npc somewhere) and the 2856 is the x-coord and 3599 is the y-coord/ 5.2 find wanneshop in client.java and change the npc code to the code you want and change the wanneshop to the number you want also. 5.3 go to shops.cfg and change the shop id to what you put as the wanneshop id you set 5.4 add your items in the shop like this
shop = WANNESHOPID 0 ITEM AMOUNT ITEM AMOUNT ITEM AMOUNT
Note:you may skip 5.1 if you have the npc where you want if not then use the 5.1 stuff Note2: you have to compile after you do this and dont skip any step except for 5.1 if you skip it then you won't do it right and you won't have a shop.

Read full topic
